loans.name: Baldeu

texts.pt:
O Sr. Baldeu de 48 anos de idade casado e pai de 5 filhos todos estao a frequentar a escola no ensino primario e secundario. Ele e trabalhador no talho a mais de 13 anos.
Com o presente emprestimo sera  aplicado para comprar material de construcao ( cimento, blocos, janela e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para dar continuidade com a sua casa.
texts.en:
Baldeu is 48 years old and is married with 5 children, all of whom are in elementary or high school. He's worked as a butcher for more than 13 years. 

With this loan he would like to continue with a home construction project by buying materials like blocks, cement, and windows, and paying workers to help with the construction.

loans.use: buy construction materials like blocks, cement, and windows, and pay workers to help with the building of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in creams, deodorants, lotions, makeup, mascara, etc

loans.name: Yesenia Aracely

texts.es: Yesenia cuenta con 18 años de vida y desde hace 3 años se gana la vida con la elaboración y venta de tortillas, y es gracias a ese esfuerzo que realiza todos los días al levantarse desde muy temprano para preparar la masa de maíz para preparar las tortillas que tanto solicitan sus clientes. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida, por lo que se siente tranquila de tener un lugar donde vivir. Yesenia sabe que en las condiciones en las que elabora sus tortillas actualmente no son las más adecuadas, es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: una plancha de tortillas, lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para construir una galera para la venta de tortillas.
texts.en:
Yesenia is 18 years old and for the last three years she has made a living making and selling tortillas thanks to the effort she puts in every day to wake up very early to prepare the corn dough to make the many tortillas that her customers request. She is a very entrepreneurial woman who lives in her own home along with her husband, which makes her feel secure having a place to live.

Yesenia is aware that the conditions in which she currently makes her tortillas are not ideal. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in: a griddle for making tortillas, galvanized sheet steel, wood and nails to build a galley for selling her tortillas.

loans.use: to invest in: a griddle for making tortillas, galvanized sheet steel, wood and nails.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy creams, lotions, deodorants, make up, mascara etc.

loans.name: Leony

texts.en:
Leony works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Leony requested a 15000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase fishing net materials, plywood, and paint for her business.

Leony has been in this business for 3 years now. In the future, Leony would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fishing net materials, plywood, and paint.

loans.name: Irene

texts.pt:
A senhora  Irene de 59 anos de idade é comerciante, solteira mae de 7 filhos dos quais 5 ja maiores de idade e independentes vivem em casa propria, 2 estao na sua responsabilidade frequentam o ensino secundario e vive com 2 netos na sua responsbilidade.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar oleo, farinha, massa, ovos, caldos, omo, peixe, sal, feijão acucar para reforcar o seu negocio.
Tem como projectos e sonhos crescer no seu negocio responder todas as necessidades de seus clientes e terminar a construcao de sua casa.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros  e faz xitique como forma de guardar o seu dinheiro, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano
texts.en:
Irene is 46 years old and is a business owner. She is married and has seven children. Five of them are grown and independent and two are in high school. She also supports two of her grandchildren, who live with her.

Irene will use this loan to strengthen her business by buying cooking oil, flour, dough, eggs, soups, fish, beans, salt, sugar and laundry detergent. Her projects and dreams for the future are to expand her business to respond to customer demand and to finish construction of her house.

Irene says that the main challenges she has faced have been financial ones. She has used the traditional Mozambican communal credit system called xitique in order to save money, and she will take out more loans in the future to make her plans a reality.

loans.use: buy cooking oil, flour, dough, eggs, soups, fish, beans, salt, sugar and laundry detergent to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in creams, deodorants, lotions, make up, lipsticks, eye shadows, mascara etc.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
Linda is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 41 years old and has five children who are in school.

Linda has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 19000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of meat, frozen foods, etc. to sell.

Linda has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, Linda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of meat, frozen foods, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 49 years old and married with seven children, five of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Melanie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 13000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell.

Melanie has been in this business for 5 years. In the future she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is 46 years old and has six children. Emily is married and two of her children are in school.

She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Emily requested a 17000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Emily has been pig fattening for 5 years now and has borrowed 8 times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Emily would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Bernadita

texts.en:
Bernadita is 30 years old, married, and has 2 children. She runs a general store in the Philippines where she works hard to provide for her family. 

Bernadita has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to purchase additional inventory of groceries to supply her general store.

Bernadita has already successfully borrowed and repaid 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running her general store for 4 years now, and she also earns income from food vending.

Bernadita aspires to save enough money to one day be able to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to stock her general store.

loans.name: Joylen

texts.en:
Joylen is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

Joylen has been in this business for two years. She earns more income from food vending.

Joylen has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Rita Elena

texts.es:
Rita de 46 años de edad, es soltera, tiene 3 hijos y los 3 estudian. Su pareja ya no eta con ella, pero se las ha arreglado para sacar a sus hijos adelante. Rita es empleada, tiene 20 años trabajando como auxiliar de limpieza en el hospital nacional en su comunidad y con ello lleva el sustento diario a su casa.

El préstamo será utilizado para iniciar un negocio de venta de enchapes, aretes, anillos, pulsera y lociones para damas, artículos que venderá con apoyo de su hija. Rita sabe que con su esfuerzo puede terminar de sacar el estudio de sus hijos y sabe que es la mejor herencia que les puede dejar
texts.en:
Rita, 46, is single and has 3 children who are all in school. 

Her partner is no longer with her but has arranged for the children to get ahead. 

Rita is employed. She has worked as a cleaning aid in the national hospital in her community for the past 20 years. This is how she supports her family on a daily basis. 

The loan will be used to start a business selling costume jewelry, earrings, rings, bracelets and creams. Items she will sell with the help of her daughter. 

Rita knows that with effort this will allow her children to keep studying which is the best legacy she can leave them.

loans.use: to start a business selling costume jewelry, earrings, rings, bracelets and creams.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in women's sandals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in socks, t-shirts, diapers, scarfs, etc. to better stock his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, and t-shirts, etc.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.pt:
A senhora  Filomena  de 30 anos de idade é escriva, solteira mae de 1 filho ainda menor vive na casa de sua mae sustenta sua mae que vive com ela na casa dela.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, pedra, varroes areia para a construcao de uma dependencia  para arrendar reforcando a renda familiar.
Tem como projectos e sonhos fazer mais dependencias  para arrendar  e voltar a ingressar numa faculdade para formar se.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao insuficiencia de fundos,  faz xitique como forma de guardar o seu dinheiro, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Filomena is 30 years old and works as a notary. She is a single mother to one young child and lives with her mother, whom she helps to support. 

Filomena will use this loan to buy stone, cement, sand and metal bars to build a separate outbuilding on her land that can be rented in order to increase the family's income. Her projects and dreams for the future are to build even more outbuildings that can be rented and to go back to school to get a college education. 

Filomena says that the main challenges she has faced have been financial ones. She's used the traditional Mozambican system of communal credit called xitique to save money, and she plans to take out more loans in the future in order to make her plans a reality.

loans.use: buy stone, cement, sand and metal bars.

loans.name: Felimon

texts.es:
Felimon vive en casa propia de material rustico, vive con su cónyugue, no cuenta con ningun hijo en su poder, Felimon es natural de la zona, tiene muy buena referencias tanto personales como laborales en su comunidad. La misma que está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio. Y ubicada en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Felimon es la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de cafe, ubicado en el caserío de Cabra Sondor - Pucara, con una experiencia en el rubro de 8 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agricolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudara a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.
texts.en:
Felimon lives in his own home made from simple materials. He lives with his partner, and they no longer have children living at home. Felimon is a native of the area and he has many good references, both personal and professional, in his community. The people of the area are largely dedicated to farming, cattle ranching, and commerce. He lives in the Pomahuaca district in the Jaén Province in the Región Cajamarca in the northern highlands of Peru. 

Felimon is a farmer and his primary crop is coffee, his fields located in the village of Cabra Sondor - Pucara. He has eight years of experience in the field. He will take advantage of this loan to pay for farm labor to apply pesticides, fertilizers, and harvesting. This will help the physiology and morphology as well as the productivity of his crop helping him to optimize his harvest. This means better production, a better quality product, and no trouble selling his crop.

loans.use: pay for farming supplies and labor for the harvest

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is married and she works hard to support her family. She has a business selling jewelry and accessories in the Philippines, and also earns income from a general store and from raising ducks. Grace is borrowing 14,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more stock of jewelry and accessories to sell to customers.

Grace has been sustaining her business activities through her past twenty-four loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock of jewelry and accessories.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Elvira works hard to support her family. She has a vegetable-vending business in the Philippines and also earns income from a general store. Elvira is borrowing 35,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell in her vegetable stall.

Elvira  has been sustaining her business activities through her past ten loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell in her vegetable stall

loans.name: Selonah

texts.en:
Selonah is 39 years old and married with three children, who are all attending school. Selonah works very hard to provide for them.

Selonah runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Selonah has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future Selonah would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 70 years old and married with six children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional groceries for her general store.

Letecia has borrowed and repaid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from buying and selling charcoal.

Letecia aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries for her general store

loans.name: Lenin Fernando

texts.es: Lenin es un joven trabajador, vive con sus padres que se dedican a la agricultura y a la ganadería, es un año que terminó la  secundaria y decidió trabajar en la misma actividad de sus padres, comenta la  crianza de ganado es un buen negocio, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de terneros para criarlas y comercializarlas y asi hacer muy productivo su negocio, lo que Lenin espera de esta actividad es seguir trabajando para ya no depender de sus padres y salir adelante como un joven responsable.
texts.en: Lenin is a young working man who lives with his parents and makes a living in the agriculture and livestock industries. One year ago, he finished high school and decided to work in the same business as his parents.  He says that raising cattle is a good business and that he is going to invest the loan in the purchase of calves to raise and sell them in order to make his business very productive. With this occupation, Lenin hopes to continue working to no longer rely on his parents and to move forward as a responsible young man.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es: Luis tiene 23 años de edad, se dedica a la ganadería juntamente con sus padres y sus hermanos, ya que viven en el campo y esa es du fuente de ingresos, comenta que tiene vacas y que por medio del ordeño y la venta de leche es como sigue aumentando su negocio, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca para tenerla  en terrenos   por la que paga arriendo para la hierba  que es el alimento para estos animales, la mayor espiración de Luis es mejorar su negocio y tener buenos ingresos para ahorrarlos y comprarse un terreno para criar sus vacas.
texts.en:
Luis, 23, works in farming along with his parents and siblings. 

They live in the countryside and this is their source of income. He comments that he has cows which he milks. He sells the milk which is how he keeps increasing his business. 

He will invest the loan in buying a cow. He will keep her out in the fields for which he pays rent for the grass to feed these animals. 

Luis's biggest aspiration is to improve his business and to have a better income allowing him to save and buy land to breed his cows.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Glenda Xiomara

texts.es: Glenda de 28 años de edad se gana la vida desde hace 5 años con su negocio de venta de productos básicos, por lo que se siente feliz de contar con esta fuente de ingresos, pero además está laboriosa mujer presta sus servicios domésticos en una empresa cercana. Ella habita en vivienda propia al lado de su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos una niña de 8 años de edad y un varón de 4 años de edad. Glenda es una mujer que no se deja vencer y siempre busca la manera de tener mejores ingresos, es por ello que ha decidido solicitar un crédito a FUSAI que le permita invertir en: pan dulce, café, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, sachets de champú, etc. Para que su negocio de venta de productos básicos se incremente y obtener de esta manera mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Glenda, 28 years old, has made a living for the last five years through her business selling basic products, and she feels happy to have this source of income. In addition to being a hardworking woman, she lends her domestic services in a nearby business. She lives in her own home alongside her life partner and their two children, an 8-year-old girl and a 4-year-old boy. 

Glenda is a woman who does not give up, and she always searches for a way to have a better income. That is why she has decided to request a loan from FUSAI that will allow her to invest in: sweet bread, coffee, sugar, rice, beans, packets of shampoo, etc. so that her business selling basic products will grow and in that way obtain better earnings.

loans.use: to invest in: sweet bread, coffee, sugar, rice, beans, packets of shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Marta Luz

texts.es: Marta de 21 años de edad es una joven emprendedora que se esfuerza cada día para poder darle estabilidad económica a su familia, es por ello que desde hace 2 años se dedica a la venta de platillos típicos como: nuégados, empanadas, pasteles de carne, etc. Además los fines de semana vende ropa interior para dama y caballero. Ella habita en vivienda propia junto a su pequeño hijo de 1 año de edad, que es su mayor motivo de salir adelante, para que a él no le falte nada. Marta desea invertir en su negocio de venta de ropa interior ya que siente que en este tiene un mayor margen de ganancias, por lo que solicita un credito a FUSAI para invertir en: sostén, blumer, brasier, calcetines, etc. Para tener una mejor ganancia y darle lo mejor a su hijo.
texts.en: Marta, 21 years old, is a young entrepreneur who strives each day to give economic stability to her family. This is why for 2 years, she has made a living selling traditional dishes, such as nuégados [syrup-coated fried dumplings], empanadas, meat pies, etc. In addition, on the weekends she sells undergarments for men and women. She lives in her own house with her small child, 1 year old, who is her greatest motivation to move forward so that he does not lack anything. Marta wishes to invest in her business selling undergarments, since she feels that she has the greatest profit margin in this business. This is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in bras, bloomers, brassieres, socks, etc., in order to have greater earnings and to give the very best to her son.

loans.use: to invest in bras, bloomers, brassieres, socks, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in papayas, watermelons, bananas, apples, grapes etc.

loans.name: Ngân

texts.en:
Mrs. Ngân operates a food stall selling fruit. Ngân has been involved in this business for more than ten years. She is 39 years old and married with two children. Ngân lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Ngân’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Ngân faces in her life is not having money to build a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Ngân hopes to maintain a successful business, for her business to do well, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
María del Rosario tiene 47 años de edad, su estado soltera. Vive con su familia, cuenta con servicios públicos de agua y luz. María del Rosario vive en el distrito de Morropon, cercado de este mismo. La comunidad es pequeña los pobladores se dedican a la crianza de ganado vacuno, cultivo y comercio de platano. Ubicada en el distrito y provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que desarrolla María del Rosario es el servicio de alquiler de maquinaria para revolver cemento en obras de construcción, además esposo se dedica al alquiler de mototaxi y trabaja en el grifo de Morropon. El destino del crédito será para invertir en el mantenimiento de su maquinaria que ofrece en alquiler para poder asegurar el correcto funcionamiento de su herramienta de trabajo y así poder seguir generando ingresos. María del Rosario tiene experiencia en el rubro.
texts.en:
María del Rosario, age 47, is single and lives with her family. They rely on public utilities for water and light. María del Rosario lives in the Morropon district in the province of Morropón, Piura region, along the northern coast of Peru. Her community is made up of people dedicated to cattle ranching and raising and selling plantains.

María del Rosario earns a living by renting concrete mixing machinery for construction projects. Her husband rents taxis and works on the Morropon municipal water supply. This loan will be used to maintain the machinery that she rents so she can make sure the tools of her job work correctly and she can keep earning mony. María del Rosario has plenty of experience in this line of work.

loans.use: maintain her rental equipment and ensure its correct function

loans.name: Sreylen

texts.en:
As a farmer from Kampong Cham Province in Cambodia, Sreylen works very hard in the rice field, which is located near her house. She is 33 years old, and she has 3 dependent children who are all currently enrolled in school. Her husband, Prounh, is 31 years old and is also a farmer in the same field. 

Sreylen and her husband earn approximately USD 3.00 a day on average. Farming has been their main source of income since 1999.

However, this farming season Sreylen lacks the funds to buy some farm supplies. In order to continue her farming, she is requesting a loan from Kiva lenders to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer, seed, and insecticide.  

Sreylen is thankful for all the lenders and their financial support. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer, seed, and insecticide.

loans.name: Miguela

texts.en:
Miguela is 60 years old and married with four children. With one child still in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Miguela runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items such as canned goods, snack foods, coffee, sugar, detergent soap, shampoo, salt, etc. to sell.

Miguela has been in this business for 16 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, snack foods, coffee, sugar, detergent soap, shampoo, salt, etc.

Miguela would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items such as canned goods, snack foods, coffee, sugar, detergent soap, shampoo, salt, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy an assortment of products such as hand creams, deodorants, lotions, wipes, among other things.

loans.name: Solange

texts.es:
Solange es una mujer de 18 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos y su negocio es la decoración para fiestas infantiles.
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, responsable, activa, constante y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la localidad de ‘El Torno’ un área rural que reúne a productores campesinos de frutas, verduras y carne, con compradores mayoristas distribuidores que se encargan de repartir toda la producción a los diferentes mercados y tiendas de la ciudad. De clima cálido, húmedo tropical, con una temperatura constante de 30 grados centígrados durante todo el año.
Solange es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello negro largo, su lengua materna es el guaraní que ya no utiliza y habla español por el comercio. su vida la realiza en casa de sus padres que está construida de ladrillo y cuenta con agua potable y electricidad. Su negocio es la decoración de fiestas infantiles; con globos, piñatas,  para niño, para niñas, etc., su negocio es innovador en el área por lo que se encarga de casi todos los cumpleaños del lugar, ya es conocida y los padres de familia acuden a ella para pedirle consejos de como organizar una fiesta infantil 'comencé organizando la fiesta de un familiar y me salió bien, mis familiares me animaron a que continúe con esta labor'. Su sueño es tener un negocio estable y desea realizar la compra de mercadería para trabajar como; cartulinas, globos, goma eva, etc. esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en dos años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Solange solicita un préstamo para la compra de material de fiestas infantiles para continuar con su labor y organizar muchas fiestas infantiles.
texts.en:
Solange is an 18 year old woman, single, without children, and her business is decorating for children's parties.

She is entrepreneurial, independent, responsible, active, constant, and hardworking.  Her business is done in the area of "El Torno," a rural area where countryside producers of fruit, vegetables, and meat gather with wholesale buyers and distributors that are responsible for distributing all of the production to the different markets and stores in the city.  It is a hot, humid tropical climate with a constant temperature of 30 degrees Celsius (86 F) throughout the whole year. 

Solange is of brown complexion, medium height, and has long black hair.  She mother language is Guaraní that she not use anymore, and she speaks Spanish for her business.  She lives in her parents' house that is made of brick and has potable water and electricity.  

Her business is decorating for children's parties with balloons, piñatas, for boys, for girls, etc.  Her business is innovative in the area so she is responsible for almost all of the parties around.  She is well known and the parents of the family come to her to ask her for advice on how to organize a children's party.  "I began organizing the party of a family member and it went well.  My family members encouraged me to continue with this job."

Her dream is to have a stable business.  She wants to buy merchandise to work with like cards, balloons, craft foam, etc.  This is the first sequence of loans with the institution in the two years that she has been doing this job.  It is for those motives that Solange is requesting a loan to buy supplies for children's parties to continue with her job and to organize many children's parties.

loans.use: To buy supplies for children's parties to continue with her job and to organize many children's parties.

loans.name: Nga

texts.en:
Mrs. Nga operates a food stall/restaurant, selling fish. She is 22 years old, and she is married, with one child. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Nga first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Nga has been involved in her business for three years.

The main hardship that Nga faces in her life is not having money to build a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick, with which to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Nga hopes to maintain a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement. and brick, with which to build a toilet.

loans.name: Santos Yllermo

texts.es:
Santos Yllermo tiene 40 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y res menores hijos en el distrito de Pucará, una ciudad de clima caluroso, su población se dedican a la agricultura de frutas, café, arroz entre otros y comercio de los mismos, también se dedican a la ganadería, ubicado a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, ubicado a en la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Santos Yllermo es la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de cafe, ubicado en el caserío de Cabra Sondor, con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agricolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudara a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.
texts.en:
Santos Yllermo is 40 years old and he lives with his wife and their younger children in the Pucará district, a city with a warm climate whose population is largely in the business of growing and selling fruit, coffee, rice and more, as well as raising cattle. It is located two hours from the city of Jaén in the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru.

Santos Yllermo is a farmer and his primary crop is coffee, his fields located in the village of Cabra Sondor. He has ten years of experience in the field. He will take advantage of this loan to pay for farm labor to apply pesticides, fertilizers, and harvesting. This will help the physiology and morphology as well as the productivity of his crop helping him to optimize his harvest. This means better production, a better quality product, and no trouble selling his crop.

loans.use: pay for farming supplies and labor for the harvest.

loans.name: Marlon

texts.en:
Marlon is a vendor residing in Dulag, Leyte. He engages in a salted fish vending business. He buys and at the same time sells salted fish to the market in the community. He is thirty-nine years old and a father of four children. The oldest child is 16 and the youngest child is one year old. He has been in this kind of business for five years.

Marlon is standing near the wooden box in which the salted fish is being stored and kept. Because of financial problems, Marlon is in need of capital to continue his livelihood.

Marlon has requested a loan of 40,000 PHP to buy various stocks of salted fish and pay for transportation expenses. This will help improved his daily sales and eventually provide his family with proper food and better living conditions.

Marlon is dreaming of expanding his business for a sustainable livelihood.

loans.use: to buy various stocks of salted fish and pay for transportation expenses.

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es:
Paulino tiene 29 años de edad, es conviviente vive en casa propia junto su esposa e hija de 01 año de edad. De familia unida. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería. Ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Paulino se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales, además ofrece servicio de jornales agrícolas en cerro Prieto y alquila su mototaxi para servicio. Solicita crédito para inversión en compra de una cantidad mayor de animales para aumentar y diversificar su stock de animales y para mantenimiento de cultivo agrícola. Así, tendrá mayores ingresos y calidad para ofrecer, por consiguiente generar ingresos para una mejora en calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Paulino, 29, lives with his wife and 1 year-old daughter in his own home.  He comes from a united family. He lives in a community in the Cayalti district where the people work in agriculture, livestock production, and commerce. This area is located in Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region of the northern coast of Peru.

Paulino works raising and selling animals.  He also works as a farmhand in Cerro Prieto, and rents out a moto-taxi.  He is requesting a loan to invest in a greater quantity of animals to expand and diversify his stock, and for maintenance of his agricultural lands.  This way, he will have more income and quality products to sell, thus generating income to support a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals

loans.name: Cecilia Macarena

texts.es: Con 52 años de edad Cecilia está casada y tiene 5 hijos, Cecilia vive con su esposo, 3 hijos y 2 nietos que están a su cargo,  ella se dedica a la ganaderia  desde que era muy joven y también trabaja en la agricultura juntamente con su esposo, comenta Cecilia que tiene su negocio que es la venta de leche ya que tiene vacas lecheras y el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca para aumentar a las que ya tiene, de su negocio Cecilia aspira mejorar su sus ingresos y de ahí juntar dinero para comprar un ordeño mecánico, ya que en la actualidad ordeña a sus vacas manualmente y esto hace que produzca dolor en sus manos.
texts.en:
Cecilia, 52, is married and has 5 children. She lives with her husband, 3 children and 2 grandchildren. 

Since she was very young she has worked with livestock. She also works with her husband in farming. 

Cecilia comments that she has a business selling milk since she has milking cows. 

She will invest the loan to buy a cow to increase her business. 

She aspires to improve her income and save for a milking machine. Currently she milks her cows by hand which causes pain in her hands.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a 50-year-old married woman with five children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Evelyn has a bakery business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for six years. She requested a PHP 24,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional ingredients for her bakery.

In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients for her bakery.

loans.name: Enkhbaigal

texts.en:
Mrs. Enkhbaigal, 53 years old, lives with her daughter and son in Kherlen, the easternmost town in Mongolia. She has retired from work and gets state pension. Before retirement, she worked as history teacher at a high school for 25 years. Her daughter works at private company and her son is unemployed. 

She is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to buy an electric car for her son. Using this car, her son will render taxi service and generate income. Also, the advantage of an electric car is that it emits harmless pollutants and wastes less fuel.

loans.use: to buy an electric car.

loans.name: Karen Gabriela

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Villamil se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Miraflores  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Karen, tiene 31 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 8 y 6 de edad, los dos estudian en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en un barco.
Doña Karen es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta ganar lo suyo para ayudarle a su marido con los gastos que generan los estudios de sus hijos, ella se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, ella deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días. Lleva 3  años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, camisas, blusas y otras prendas. Lleva dos años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan los créditos. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus pequeños.
texts.en:
The Villami lending group meets every two weeks in the Miraflores neighborhood of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches which are well visited year round because it’s a beautiful city without equal, and with many tourist attractions.

Karen lives here.  She is 31 years old, married, and has two children, ages 8 and 6.  Both attend school.  Her husband works at a bank.

Karen is a hardworking woman who likes to earn on her own so she can help out with her children’s school expenses.  She sells all types of clothing door to door and from her home, where her best customers visit her.  She sells on credit and collects each week and she’s been doing this for three years.  She will use the money from this loan to buy pants, shirts, blouses and other items

She has been with the group for two years and she likes it because the loans are helpful  She wants to provide her children with the best.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Djekabara 2 Group

texts.fr:
Constitué de neuf hommes et d’une femme, les membres du groupe  Djekabara 2  sont tous mariés et ont une moyenne d’âge de 37 ans, 4 enfants et vivent tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Tionso, un des villages de Koutiala, 3ème région administrative du Mali. Ils collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités de maraîchage. Ils sont à leur 2ème prêt.
La spéculation cultivée est l’échalote avec Ramatou, assise au bout  à gauche sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des Semences, intrants et matériels pour entretenir 0,25 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à Koutiala, après la récolte, à une clientèle mixte. 
Ils compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 125 000FCFA en fin de période.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et faire face à ses dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
Consisting of nine men and one woman, the members of the Djekabara 2 group are all married and have an average age of 37 years and an average of 4 children each. They all live in traditional families in Tionso, one of the villages of Koutiala, the 3rd administrative region of Mali.

The members of the group partnered with the microfinance organization Soro Yiriwaso in order to better run their farming businesses. They are on their second loan.

Ramatou, seated on the far left of the photo, is in the business of farming shallots. With her loan, she plans on purchasing seeds, fertilizer, and supplies to maintain .25 hectares.

Ramatou sells her crops at the village level and in Koutiala, after her harvest, to a customer base made up of both men and women. The members of the group plan to earn an average income of 125,000 francs CFA by the end of the growing period. This income will allow each to pay back the loan and to take care of daily expenses.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertlizer, and supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, bricks, and cement

loans.name: Vấn

texts.en:
Vấn is 57 years old, and he is married with 3 children. He lives and works in Thieu Hoá district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoá province in Vietnam.

This is Vấn's first loan with Thanh Hoá Fund for Poor Women.

While Vấn has been working at his business for more than 10 years now, he nonetheless faces the hardship of not having enough money to build a hygienic latrine. 

Vấn is requesting a loan in order to purchase sand, cement, and brick so he can build a toilet for his family.

For the future, Vấn hopes to continue to maintain and grow a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet for his family.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
Celia es una madre de familia de 44 años de edad que vive junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el distrito de Cayalti, un distrito que se dedica a la agricultura, pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo y se encuentra ubicada en la región de Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Celia se dedica a la actividad de venta de abarrotes, además de ropa y productos de belleza, desde hace más de 13 años de antiguedad en el negocio, en su propio domicilio. Celia solicita préstamo para la compra de mercaderia como arroz, azucar y ropa. De esta manera hacer crecer su negocio, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Celia is a 44 year-old mother who lives with her spouse and her children in the Cayalti district, an agricultural district that belongs to the Chiclayo province, located in the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.

For more than 13 years, Celia has run her business out of her own house and has made a living selling groceries, as well as clothes and beauty products. Celia is requesting a loan to purchase merchandise such as rice, sugar and clothes in order to grow her business, which will enable her to improve her income in the short-term, increase her earnings, and thus improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as rice, sugar and clothes to grow her business

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan helped her provide for the educational expenses of her children and pay for their daily needs. She primarily used the loan for her variety store business, and she has successfully repaid it.

She now focuses on her printing business, and she is very positive that she could improve this business more if you will lend her an amount of 50,000 PHP. She will use the new loan for the maintenance of her printing business and also to purchase more cosmetic products, which she resells.

Improving her service will increase her sales, and an increase in sales will also result in a significant increase in profit, which will also result in her business to become viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family.

Lorna wants to buy a bigger place for her business, and she also desires to open branches. She dreams that her family will always be happy and healthy. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of her printing business and buy cosmetic products to sell.

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta is 64 years old and married. She has ten children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines.

Marietta has requested a PHP 35,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy items to sell, like shampoo, groceries, etc. She has borrowed and repaid 20 loans from NWTF, before this loan.

She has been running the general store for 34 years and also earns an income from farming rice. She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is a married woman, with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Rosemarie is 43 years old, and two of her children are currently in school.

She has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy ingredients for her food preparation activity, like noodles, spices, vegetables, and meat.

Rosemarie has been in this business for seven years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food preparation, like noodles, spices, vegetables, and meat.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 57 years old and married with six children.

She earns a living from poultry in the Philippines. Myrna is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her chickens.

Myrna has been in the poultry business for five years and also earns additional income from raising livestock.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her chickens.

loans.name: Irenella

texts.en:
Irenella is 29 years old and has five children. She is married and two of her children are currently in school.

Irenella is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Irenella requested an 11000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy vitamins, vaccines, and other supplies for her business.

Irenella has been raising livestock for 4 years now and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Irenella would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, vaccines, and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesus

texts.es: Mariana es una señora casada, ella tiene 4 hijos   de los cuales 3 aun están estudiando, Mariana juntamente con su esposo tiene un negocio que es familiar, se dedican a la elaboración de ladrillo en la ciudad donde residen, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cemento, tierra y arena que son los materiales necesarios para elaborar ladrillo, comenta que tiene 2 empleados constantes quienes le ayudan para que su pequeña industria este en marcha, la aspiración de Mariana es que le siga yendo bien en su negocio y de ser posible mejorarlo para que siga siendo el sustento de su familia y de la familia de sus empleados.
texts.en: Mariana is married and has four children, three of whom are in school.  Mariana and her husband run a family business making bricks in their hometown. The loan will be used to buy cement, earth, and sand which are the necessary materials for making bricks. They have two full-time employees who help them keep their small business running. Mariana's goal is to keep her business running smoothly and improve it as they're able so that they can keep supporting their own family and the families of their employees.

loans.use: buy cement and sand

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a clean energy cook stove

loans.name: Mikheil

texts.en:
Mikheil is 49 years old and lives with his wife and their three children in the village of Agaraki. He was a teacher at Waldorf School Tbilisi. After a stay in Germany for extension studies, he came back to Georgia but could not find work as a teacher anymore. He found only a part-time job at a window production company, which does not generate enough income to support his family.

Inspired by organic animal husbandry he had come in contact with in Germany, he decided to keep milk cows and produce dairy products to have additional income. He makes cheese and Georgian-style yogurt called matsoni. In order to have healthy natural products, his cows are only fed grass, hay and grain but no antibiotics or other additives. According to the anthroposophic teaching, Mikheil makes a point of respect and good surroundings for his animals, which has a positive effect on the milk they give.

Most of the cheese, yogurt and milk is sold at the Waldorf school for the pupils and their families. In this way, they have the opportunity to buy high-quality healthy dairy products. With the help of the loan, Mikheil will buy six more milk cows.

loans.use: to buy cows and make more dairy products.

loans.name: Davaadorj

texts.en: Mr. Davaadorj, 37 years old, lives with his family in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been transporting goods since 2011. His wife works as a nurse at a hospital. Using his previous loan, he has joined two containers and made his house. Now he is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to buy insulation materials such as fiberglass, foam and bricks in order to renovate his house. After renovation, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and less pollutants are released into the air.

loans.use: to insulate his house

loans.name: Oyunchimeg

texts.en:
Mrs. Oyunchimeg is 47 years old and lives with her husband in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

She has been running a grocery store since 2007. She lives there with her husband who works as a sentry, or security guard, at a high school. They have 3 children, all of whom now live on their own. 

Their grocery store has been deteriorating over the years. So Mrs. Oyunchimeg is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT in order to buy building materials such as planks, cement, fiberglass, and foam to be able to renovate.  

After renovation, her grocery store will attract customers and increase sales, thereby improving her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to renovate her grocery store.

loans.name: Sumiya

texts.en:
Mrs. Sumiya, 69 years old, lives with her husband in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She and her husband both have retired from work and get a state pension. They have one son who is married and lives on his own. She is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD to buy a plot of land in order to use it for farming. 

In the profile picture, the borrower is together with her husband.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land.

loans.name: Sarangerel

texts.en:
Mrs. Sarangerel, 57 years old, lives with her husband and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been supplying crystal products to retailers since 1994. Her husband has retired from work. Their son works at a private company.

She is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to buy crystal products in large quantity for the coming Christmas. During Christmas, demand for crystal products increases greatly, and she doesn't want to disappoint the retailers who are in need of products.

In the profile picture, the borrower is with her husband, whose physical condition is in bad shape.

loans.use: to supply crystal products.

loans.name: Franco Kilderd

texts.es:
El socio Franco sigue dedicándose a su negocio de  imprenta, referente a diseño de publicidad  de empresa, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones personales, él socio es diseñador grafico, siendo de esta manera que el socio sale adelante.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de una laptop.
 Franco agradece a  KIVA por permitirle adquirir una herramienta que le ayude en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Franco continues with his printing busines, publishing for companies.  He is a responsible and dedicated person and has been conducting his business which gives him great personal satisfaction.  He is a graphic designer and this is how he earns a living.

El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de una laptop.

He is asking for a loan to buy a laptop.

He is grateful to Kiva for helping him buy his work tools.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a variety of fresh fish for her fish-vending business and piglets for the start-up of her hog-raising business

loans.name: Genalin

texts.en: Genalin is a 44-year-old entrepreneur who has been selling dried fish in the market for over four years. She earns a good income from this business which has helped her to augment her living situation. Genalin took out a new loan recently to buy more varieties of dried fish to sell in her store. She is planning to build a shelter for her store to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more varieties of dried fish to sell in her store

loans.name: Nilo

texts.es:
Nilo tiene 20 años de edad, es soltero. No tiene hijos dependientes. Nilo vive solo en el Caserío Fila Alta, él realiza las labores de destilación de aguardiente. Aprovechando las extensiones de caña que posee. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio. Ubicada en el distrito de Callacyuc, provincia y región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

Nilo esta dedicado a la destilación de aguardiente, en el caserío Fila Alta desde hace más de 5 años, Nilo requiere el presente crédito para realizar los pagos de peones en los deshierbos de caña, cuyo producto lo utiliza para la destilación de aguardiente. Esto le ayudará a la implementación de sus equipos de destilación. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Nilo posee conocimientos en el negocio, por lo que se espera una gran cosecha.
texts.en:
Nilo is 20 years old and single; he has no dependent children. He lives by himself in the village of Fila Alta and has five years of experience working as a distiller of aguardiente, a kind of distilled spirits, using the plots of sugar cane he owns. His community is generally in the business of agriculture, cattle ranching, and commerce. It is located in the Callacyuc district in the provice and region of Cajamarca in the northern highlands of Peru.

Nilo will use this loan to pay the laborers who weeded his sugar cane fields, the sugar cane being necessary for the distillation of aguardiente. This will help him to better implement his distillation equipment and improve his sales in the short term. This increases his income and helps him to improve his and his family's quality of life. Nilo has the know-how to make this business work, which is why he is anticipating a good harvest.

loans.use: pay laborers to weed his sugarcane field and distill sugar-based liquor

loans.name: Andy

texts.en:
His name is Andy, 31, a resident of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. He is married to Divine Grace and has three children, of which the eldest is still in the Preparatory Level and the other two are not of school age yet. His wife manages their household and takes care of their kids. He works to meet their everyday needs and support their child's schooling.

Andy has operated a tricycle for five years already. His tricycle carries up to four passengers. In the Philippines, especially in the provinces like Coron, tricycle is a common means of transportation; jeepneys and buses are limited and very few people own a vehicle. The town people usually ride a tricycle from their homes to market, church, to their friend’s homes, and to other destinations within their community. They even transport from one town to the other. He earns a minimum of 500 PHP a day. 

To help him continue his transport business, he is requesting a 10000 PHP loan, which he will use to pay for gas and the repair of his tricycle. He is positive that this will boost his income, as tricycle transportation is really a necessity in their place. He is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given to him.

Andy hopes that his tricycle service will continue and aims to buy another unit to improve his income. He wants to give his family a decent life and send his children to school. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship members to share stories of his work every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God he studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the repair of his tricycle.

loans.name: Vevelyn

texts.en:
Vevelyn is 34 years old and married, with one child in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Vevelyn has a used clothing business in the Philippines. She requested a 20000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of used clothes to sell.

Vevelyn has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Vevelyn would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Viola

texts.en:
Viola works hard to support her family. Viola is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Viola requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Viola has been in this business for 15 years now.

In the future, Viola would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es:
Sandra junto con su esposo (ver foto), logro consolidar un negocio de tienda general en una vereda, que son zonas que carecen mucho de este tipo de negocio puesto que la mayoría de familiar come lo que producen en el campo.

Sandra es madre de tres hijas de 12, 10 y 9 años de edad, lo son todo para ella trabaja entre 10 y 12 horas diarias solo por buscar un mejor futuro para ellas que estudien y tengan las oportunidades que ella por falta de recursos no pudo tener. 

El negocio aprendio empíricamente, y ahora que tiene un recorrido quiere fortalecer su negocio y tú la puedes ayudar a masificar sus ingresos para poder pagar la educación de sus hijas.

Con la ayuda de un crédito el cual invertirá en surtido en general, pero más en productos que no producen la tierra como productos de aseo general y algunos granos y verduras pocos comunes que no cultivan.

Este crédito le ayuda a mejorar sus ventas, diversificar la oferta de productos.
texts.en:
Sandra, along with her husband (see photo), managed to establish a general store on the sidewalk, since these areas lack this type of business because the majority of families eat what they produce in the fields.

Sandra is a mother to three daughters, ages nine, ten, and twelve, who mean the world to her. She works between ten and twelve hours per day just so they have a better future of going to school and having the opportunities that she could not have due to the lack of resources. 

She learned the business empirically and now that she has a plan, she wants to strengthen her business. You can help increase her income so she is able to pay for her daughters to attend school.

With the help from a loan, she will buy an assortment of items, but mostly products that are not produced by the land such as cleaning supplies in general and some grains and vegetables that are not commonly grown.

This loan will help her to improve her sales and diversify the products she offers.

loans.use: to buy basic goods to stock her store.

loans.name: Yon

texts.en:
As a farmer from Kampong Cham Province, Yon, 57 years old, works very hard on the rice field near his house. He has four children; one is single and three are married. His wife, Phai, 55, is also a farmer in the same field. This couple can earn approximately 4 USD a day, on average. Farming has been their main work for more than twenty years.

In this farming season, Yon lacks money to buy some farm supplies. To continue his farming, he is borrowing some money from Kiva now to buy farm supplies like fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides. He is thankful to lenders for the financial support. He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia has a backyard business raising pigs. She has the benefit of a small vacant lot at her home where she is able to raise her pigs.  

She wants to raise more pigs in order to improve her savings for the future needs of her family. 

Alicia recently took a new loan to be able to purchase feed and boost her pigs' growth. 

Alicia hopes to expand her business, earn more income, and provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Martin Humberto

texts.es:
Martin Humberto tiene 37 años de edad, su estado civil es Conviviente y con carga familiar vive en casa propia de material rustico en el caserio Km 66, es un lugar donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio cuenta con servicios básicos como son agua y luz. Ubicada en el distrito y provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que desarrolla Martin Humberto es el servicio de transporte urbano en sus mototaxis, teniendo 2 mototaxis el cual una la da en alquiler teniendo ingresos adicionales, y la otra es trabajada por él; su cónyuge se dedica como cocinera en un restaurant teniendo un ingresos fijo mensual, Martin Humberto es conocido en el rubro y cuenta con clientes fijos haciendo carreras fijas diarias. El destino del crédito será para construcción de una parte de su vivienda ya que se aproxima temporada de lluvias, por lo que mejorará la seguridad de su casa para que no se vean afectados con las lluvias, lo que le permitirá darle a su familia una mayor comodidad y seguridad lo que se reflejara en una mejora en su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Martin Humberto is 37 years old, lives with his partner, and has a family. He lives in his own house made of rustic materials in the village Km 66, a place where its inhabitants make a living in agriculture, livestock farming, and trade. It has basic utility services such as running water and electricity and is located in the district and province of Morropón, in the Piura region on the north coast of Peru.

The occupation that Martin is developing is an urban transport service in his motorcycle-taxis. He has two motorcycle-taxis, one of which he rents out for additional income, and the other which he uses. His wife makes a living as a cook in a restaurant with a fixed monthly income. Martin is known in the business and has regular clients, making consistent fares every day. The purpose of this loan will be to construct a part of his house so that it is not affected by the rain, which will allow him to give his family a greater level of comfort and security that will be reflected in an improvement in their quality of life.

loans.use: to construct a part of his home since the rainy season is approaching

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia tiene 69 años de edad, su estado civil es conviviente, tiene 5 hijos mayores de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su cónyuge en el caserío Km 83. La vida en el caserío se desarrolla tranquilamente debido a que en lo que respecta al negocio u a otra actividad que se desarrollan sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería y crianza de animales(vacuno,ovino caprino y aves de corral). Dicho caserío se ubica en el distrito de La Matanza, provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Lidia es la crianza y comercio de animales menores. La actividad la realiza desde hace más de 10 años, en el caserío Km 83. El destino del crédito será para invertirlo en compra de alimento de engorde balanceado para su ganado vacuno, pues ella desea comprar panca miel como sustento principal para su ganado su vacuno. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas debido a que el servicio y producto que ofrece nuestro Lidia es muy comercial en la zona. Además ella piensa trabajar otorgando buen servicio y buen producto(comercio de animales) a sus clientes. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lidia, age 69, lives with her partner and has five grown children. She and her partner live in their own home in the village of Km 83, located in the district of La Matanza, Morropón province, in the Piura region along the northern coast of Peru. Life in the village proceeds calmly and most of the villagers are involved in agriculture, cattle ranching, or raising other animals such as cows, sheep, or penned birds. 

Lidia herself raises and sells young animals and she's been in in this line of work for ten years. This loan will be used to buy Pancamiel, a type of nutritionally balanced feed, for her young male cattle. This market has good prospects as Lidia's services and products are highly sought in the area. She also works hard to provide both good service and good products (her animal sales) to her customers. This helps her increase her income in the short term, expand her earnings, and ultimately improve both her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: buy nutritionally balanced feed for her cattle

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena is 40 years old and married with five children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal.

Nena has borrowed and repaid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy-and-sell charcoal business for five years and also earns an income from food vending.

Nena aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Thoa's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thoa, born in 1976, is a Thai ethnic woman. Her family consists of 5 members: Thoa, her husband, her two daughters and her little son. Both of her daughters live with their husbands at their parents-in- law and their young son lives with Thoa and her husband in Mai Son district, Son La province.

The family’s main income is from cultivation and livestock breeding. Their annual net income is just enough to cover their living costs, with a little bit of money left over. Thoa needs more money to buy organic fertilizer for coffee, but the saved amount is not enough. She wants to borrow a loan to buy the fertilizer. Thoa hopes the loan will partially help her family to invest effectively, improve the soil and protect the environment, and that the coming harvest will bring her family a higher yield.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 42 years old and married with five children. Two of her children are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Gina has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. Gina requested a PHP 26,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stocks of pants, shirts, shoes and other ready-to-wear clothing.

Gina has been in this business for seven years. In the future, Gina would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of pants, shirts, shoes and other ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza is 36 years old and has five children. Flordeliza is married and has three children who are currently in school.

Flordeliza is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Flordeliza requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional livestock, vitamins and other supplies for her business.

Flordeliza has been raising livestock for four years now, and has borrowed from NWTF five times in the past to sustain it.

In the future, Flordeliza would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock, vitamins and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 41 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Rowena is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Rowena has been farming rice for 10 years and also earns additional income from pig fattening.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.en:
Gerardo, 36, is a resident of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. He is married to Minerva, who manages their household, and they have seven children. Gerardo works hard to provide for his family’s daily personal and household needs and for his children's schooling.

Gerardo operates a variety store which, in the Philippines, is basically a small convenience store which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, PHP 5 worth of cooking oil, or an egg. Gerardo earns an income by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. His store is located adjacent to his house and his regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. Gerardo also harvest crabs to sell at his store. He earns a minimum of PHP 2,000 in sales every day. 

To help him continue operations of his business, Gerardo is requesting a PHP 27,000 loan which he will use to buy grocery items such as sacks of rice, corn, charcoal, sugar, cooking oil, and beverages, and to pay for a fish net which he will use to harvest crabs to sell. Gerardo thanks God and you in advance for a good return on his investment and for the financial help that will be given to him.

Gerardo aims to grow his business to give his family a better life. He wants to send all his children to school. He prays for a happy and quiet life. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship* members weekly to share stories of his work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and a fish net to harvest crabs.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Mary works hard to support her family.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Mary is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies for her sugarcane farming business.

Mary has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, which is to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Sandra Jean

texts.en:
Sandra Jean is 24 years old and married with one child. With her child currently in school, Sandra Jean works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

She has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, biscuits, cereals, juice, coffee, soft-drinks, etc. Sandra Jean would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Muzaffar

texts.ru:
Музаффар женщина 59 лет. Она очень трудолюбивая  женщина. Замужем, имеет одного ребенка. В основном она занимается животноводством  и этим зарабатывает на жизнь. Он сотрудничает с МДО Арванд с марта 2014 года. С  помощью полученных кредитов  она улучшала свои жилищные условия . На этот раз она обратилась  с просьбой  выдать ей кредит  для животноводства. Она хочет купить скот для откорма и продать по более высокой цене на местном рынке. Этим она приносит доход в свою и семью.     
Музаффар  заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Muzaffar is a 59-year old woman. She is very hard-working. She is married and is the mother of one. Her main line of work is raising livestock; this is how she makes a living. [She] has been working with the Arvand microfinance institution since 2014. She was able to improve her living conditions thanks to her loans. 

This time Muzaffar has applied for a livestock loan. She would like to buy cattle for fattening and later resale at a higher price at the local market. This is how she  provides for her family. Muzaffar thanks you in advance for your trust and support.

loans.use: to buy  cattle.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Zenaida works hard to support her family. She has a bakery business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling rice. Zenaida is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy more stocks of ingredients such as flour, margarine, yeast, etc. for her bakery business.

Zenaida has been sustaining her business activities through her past 18 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of ingredients such as flour, margarine, yeast, etc.

loans.name: Rizki

texts.en:
This is the story of Rizki:

"I come from the island of Maluku, precisely in the village of Pasir Putih, in the region of South Buru. In my village, people are very good life and their livelihood as a farmer on average. My father works as a farmer in the field; my father's income is very minimal. The weather in our area greatly affects the income of local residents. If the weather is bad, the harvest can be very small at all. Even if its flooded rice fields, it can cause crop failure; my father did not return any results. While the burden is a lot, I am the fourth of seven brothers. My brother did not go to school because the first one had to help my father. I am very sad, seeing my father struggle, just to pay for my school and my brothers. Because my father wished, the children can get a good education and a dream can take higher education. With the loan from Kiva program at the Academy of Maritime Nusantara (AMN), I apply for these loans, to finance my college for 3 years at AMN. And these loans can ease the burden on my parents. Thanks to the lenders in the world."

loans.use: to pay his education fees for three years.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a clean energy cook stove

loans.name: Odontsetseg

texts.en: Mrs. Odontsetseg, 47 years old, lives with her husband and two daughters in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Their daughters both study at university. Odontsetseg and her husband have been selling lumber at an outdoor market since 1999. She used to work at a building company. Odontsetseg is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to buy lumber in large amounts to store for later sale. During the winter, the demand for lumber decreases greatly and it is more profitable to store lumber and sell it during the spring.

loans.use: to buy lumber in large amounts

loans.name: Sixto

texts.es:
Sixto tiene 69 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge, en casa propia en el Sector La Popan Bajo, donde la vida es muy tranquila y armoniosa. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio. Y está ubicada en el distrito de Saña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Sixto se dedica a las actividad de producción y venta de forrajes con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que está ubicado en su mismo domicilio, él solicita préstamo para la compra de un motor con el cual bombea agua de su pozo, dicha inversión servirá para irrigar sus cultivos forrajeros. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Sixto, age 69, lives with his partner in their own home in the La Popan Bajo area, where life is tranquil and harmonious. The community is located in the Saña district of the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region along the northern coast of Peru. Most of the people there are in the business of farming, ranching, or commerce.

Sixto himself is in the business of growing and selling animal fodder and he has more than ten years of experience in the business, which he runs out of his home. This loan will be used to buy a motor for a pump that runs water from his well. This investment will irrigate his forage crop. In the short term, this will increase his income, expand his sales, and ultimately help improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: buy a pump motor to irrigate his forage crops

loans.name: Maycita

texts.en:
Maycita is 55 years old and married with 8 children and living in Ozamiz City. She has been operating their banana farm in the village to make a living aside from raising pigs. 

She wants to fertilize the entire farm to restore nutrients. She took a new loan recently to buy organic fertilizer to have a more productive harvest. Her future plan is to improve the entire farm and be able to renovate their house for a comfortable life for the entire family.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer to have a more productive harvest.

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.en:
This is Virgilio. He sends you his thanks for your generosity because his previous loan enhanced his business. He was able to buy spare parts and accessories for his vehicle. The loan also helped him provide for their daily needs and expenditures.

He is very positive that he could improve his business more if you will let him borrow an amount of 30,000 PHP again. This new loan will go to additional supplies of accessories and spare parts for the jeepney. Simultaneously, he could sustain the needs of his family if the unit is regularly maintained and in good condition.

Virgilio wants to buy another jeepney unit for his transportation business. He only dreams of a simple yet healthy life for his family. He meets every week with his *co-fellowship members to share stories of his work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the spare parts and maintenance of his Jeepney (public transport vehicle).

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
Loreta is a 61-year-old married woman and a mother of seven grown up children from Leyte, Philippines. Loreta owns a small sari-sari or variety store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. This is her source of making a living.

She is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, rice, biscuits and snack foods, soap and toiletries, condiments and others.
