Her main business is a unisex hair salon but she also does outside catering and events management. She is hard working and has managed to look after her children as a single parent. 

She hopes to have a standard salon and pay school fees for her children.

She wants the loan to buy barber's chairs, a drier, towel warmer and hair cutting machine to use in her salon.

loans.use: to buy barber's chairs, a drier, towel warmer and hair cutting machine to use in her salon.

loans.name: Sheryl

texts.en:
Sheryl is 37 years old and married with four children who are in school, Sheryl works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Sheryl has been in this business for 2 years.

In the future Sheryl would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana de 54 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en vivienda propia al lado de sus 4 hijos 2 mujeres y dos hombres ya mayores de edad que le apoyan económicamente. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se esfuerza por sostener la economía de su hogar apoyada por sus hijos y de su negocio de venta de tortillas, dicha actividad la realiza desde hace 7 años en una zona de mucha afluencia de personas. Ana desea cambiar las láminas de la pared y el techo de la cocina ya que actualmente se encuentran deterioradas, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar las láminas de la cocina y así tener un lugar adecuado para preparar sus alimentos.
texts.en:
Ana is a 54-year-old single mother and lives in her own home next to her 4 children; 2 women and 2 men who are now adults and support her financially.  She is an enterprising woman who strives to maintain her household finances with the help of her children and her business selling tortillas. She has been working at this business for seven years in a very populated area.  

Ana wants to change the metal sheets on the wall and roof of the kitchen, as they are currently deteriorating.   For this purpose, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails to change the metal sheets in the kitchen and have a suitable place to prepare her food.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails to change the sheet metal in the kitchen.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is a thirty nine year old, married man, and the father of thirteen children, living in Bundibugyo-Uganda. 

He buys and sells cocoa but he also has a lock up which sells general merchandise. He started this business to earn a living and support his family. He hopes to have a bigger business in future despite the challenge of high transport costs and seasonality changes. 

Elisa wants the loan to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is a 50 year old married woman from Leyte, Philippines. She makes a living through her sari-sari or retail store business. She sells goods like rice, soda, canned goods and other food items.

Editha is asking for a loan to buy more stocks of items like rice, soda, canned goods, noodles, soap and toiletries to sell. This will help her improve her stock which will attract more buyers to her store.

Editha is optimistic that she will be able to improve her business and income.

loans.use: to buy more items like rice, soda, canned goods, noodles, soap and toiletries to sell.

loans.name: Mamlakat

texts.en:
Mamlakat was born in 1957. She is married and her children are adults. 

Mamlakat has her own business; she is a very hard-working and industrious woman. She has been busy buying and selling fabrics. Mamlakat has a store in a local market and she has worked in this field for more than 20 years. She has great experience in this field. Mamlakat began her business with a small working capital in 1990, thanks to the support of her husband. Nowadays her husband helps her with managing the business. 

She is going to increase her working capital and maximize profit. She is asking for a loan of 10,000 TJS to buy fabrics and to increase her working capital. 

She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and increase her working capital.

loans.name: Saliya

texts.ru: Салия, 60 лет года, замужем, дети взрослые и самостоятельные. У Салии среднее образование. Она по характеру: спокойная, уравновешенная и трудолюбивая. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, уже много лет занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Салии, в хозяйстве имеется: 5 коров, 10 коз. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Салия обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Она является лидером группы "Роза", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека. Всего их трое. Доходы от кредита Салия планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства, а также, в будущем хочет купить мебель для дома.
texts.en: Saliya is 60 years old and married. Her children are grown and live independently. Saliya has received secondary education. She is a calm, even-tempered and hard-working person by nature. As a main source of income for her family, she has been raising livestock for many years. Thanks to Saliya's hard work, she now has five cows and 10 goats on her farm. In order to develop her business further, Saliya has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KGS to buy livestock. Saliya is the leader of the Roza ["Rose"] borrowers' group, which includes two other members in addition to her. There are three of them altogether. Saliya plans to invest the revenues resulting from her loan in a further expansion of her farm. In the future she would also like to buy furniture for her home.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to grow her business.

loans.name: Otoniel Santiago

texts.es: OTONIEL SANTIAGO: Es un hombre trabajador, sociable, tiene 49 años de edad, casado, tiene 4 hijos. Desde hace 20 años vive en una casa de concreto. Solicita financiamiento para mejorar el techo de su vivienda. Su sueño es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y apoyar para la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en: Otoniel Santiago is a hard-working, sociable man. He is 49 years old, married, and has 4 children. He has lived in his concrete house for 20 years. He seeks financing to improve the roof of his home. His dream is to improve his family's quality of life and to support the education of his children.

loans.use: to improve the roof of his home.

loans.name: Sabougnouma 5 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe  Sabougnouma 5  sont des hommes mariés  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 40 ans, 3 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Fonfona, un des villages de Koutiala, 3ème région administrative du Mali. Ils collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités de maraîchage. Ils sont à leur 2ème prêt.
La spéculation cultivée est l’échalote et tomate avec Oumar Kartié, arrêté 2ème  de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, il compte acheter des Semences, intrants et matériels pour exploiter sa partielle de 0,5 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à Koutiala, après la récolte, à une clientèle mixte. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 115 000FCFA en fin de période.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et faire face à ses dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The 10 members of the Sabougnouma 5 group are married men averaging 40 years of age, with three children. They all live in traditional families in Fonfona, a village in Koutiala, the third administrative region of Mali. They collaborate with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution in order to better manage their vegetable-growing businesses. They are on their second loan.

They grow shallots and tomatoes, which is the case of Oumar Kartié, for example. He is second one standing from left to right in the photo. With his loan he plans to use seed, agricultural inputs [such as fertilizers] and supplies in order to work his 0.5 ha [1.2 acres] land plot.

After harvesting, he sells his produce in  his village and in Koutiala, to a mixed clientele. He plans to earn an average revenue of 115,000 West African francs at the end of the agricultural cycle. This revenue will allow him to pay off his loan and meet everyday expenses.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and supplies.

loans.name: El Esfuerzo Es Grande Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “El Esfuerzo Es Grande” está conformada por 11 socios emprendedores y trabajadores. Claudia de 21 años de edad es separada con 01 hijo dependiente. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos cosméticos y de belleza. El deseo de Claudia es ampliar el volumen de sus productos llegando así a más clientes. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de perfumes, talcos, desodorantes y colonias.  El grupo “El Esfuerzo Es Grande” agradecen a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien. Claudia se encuentra de pie en la parte posterior, es la cuarta del lado derecho y viste chaleco marrón con rayas rosado.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank  "El Esfuerzo Es Grande" [The Effort is Great] is comprised of 11 entrepreneurial and hardworking members.  Claudia, who is 21-years-old, is separated with one dependent child.  She sells cosmetics and beauty products.  Claudia's desire is to increase the volume of her products to reach more customers.  This is why she requested a loan to buy perfumes, powders, deodorants, and colognes.  

The "El Esfuerzo Es Grande" group thanks those who made this loan possible and promises to continue working well.  Claudia is standing in the back, the fourth on the right, and wears a vest that is brown with pink stripes.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, powders, deodorants, and colognes.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is a 54 year old, married woman with nine children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Roselyn has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell.

Roselyn has been in this business for five years. In the future, Roselyn would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Joann

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Joann works hard to support her family.

She has a dried fish making business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Joann is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fish to make dried fish for her business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Joann has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to make dried fish.

loans.name: Ma. Ellyn

texts.en:
Ma. Ellyn is 29 years old and single.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Ma. Ellyn has borrowed and repaid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 2 years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is a thirty nine year old married man with six children living in Bundibugyo-Uganda. 

He used his previous loan to buy fish to sell. He deals in fish selling but he also buys and sells cocoa to increase his income. He sells fish in the Bundibugyo main market and he has been in this business since 1994. 

He is very hard working and he hopes to build a permanent house though he is still challenged by a lack of preseravtion equipment for his fish which sometimes goes bad. 

He wants the loan to buy more fish and cocoa for resale.

loans.use: to buy more fish and cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en:
Harriet is a thirty five year old, married woman with four children living in Bundibugyo-Uganda. 

She deals in selling fish and she has done well in this business. She is very thankful for the loan that she previously took because it has helped her to expand her business and reap more profits. She faces a hardship of high competition from other people in the same business. 

She wants a loan to buy more fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Celia Adriana

texts.es: CELIA ADRIANA: Es una joven alegre de 29 años de edad, luchadora, casada con 2 hijos que cursan su primaria. Su esposo es informático. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos y acceder a financiamiento desde hace 2 años estuvo integrada en el grupo solidario PINK, permitiéndole diversificar sus productos que vende. Solicita su primer financiamiento en la modalidad de crédito individual, para comprar en Managua mercadería: pantalones para damas y caballeros, vestidos y blusas, botas y zapatos para hombres y mujeres, accesorios de oro laminado y acero para damas, brazaletes, aretes, cadenas, pulseras, dijes, entre otros productos. Que los vende de manera ambulante o por encargo. Su sueño es establecer una tienda.
texts.en: Celia Adriana is a happy, hard-woring 29 year old woman. She is married with 2 children who attend elementary school. Her husband works on computers. With the goal of having her own source of income and accessing financing, 2 years ago she joined the solidarity group PINK, enabling her to diversify the products she sells. She seeks her first financing as an individual loan to go to Managua and buy pants, dresses, blouses, boots, and shoes for men and women, gold plated and steel accessories for women, bracelets, earrings, chains, and other products. She sells her items as a street vendor and also by order. Her dream is to open a store..

loans.use: to buy pants, dresses, blouses, boots, and shoes for men and women, gold plated and steel accessories for women.

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en:
Ellen is a 30 year old married woman and a mother of two children ages 6 and 2. Ellen has operated a small sari-sari store for more than 2 years now. She sells various goods and items to the people in her area.

Ellen is asking for a loan to buy more stock like canned goods, noodles, rice, soap and toiletries, biscuits and chips to sell. This will enable her to improve her stocks thus attracting more buyers to her store.

Ellen wants to expand her business in the future. She also wants to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock like canned goods, noodles, rice, soap and toiletries, biscuits and chips to sell.

loans.name: Gulnoz

texts.en:
Gulnoz was born in 1968. She is a careful mother of 5 children. Two of them are young. Gulnoz is a very hard-working woman and tries hard for the well-being of her children. 

Gulnoz has been busy with making and selling salads. She buys vegetables, prepares different salads from vegetables and sells them in a local market. She has many customers because people use fresh salads from vegetables every day. 

Gulnoz is widowed and is the only provider for her children. Now, she needs financial support because her son studies at the university and she must pay for his tuition. 

Gulnoz is asking for a loan of 10,000 TJS to pay for the tuition of her son. 
She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to pay for her son's tuition.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Marilyn works hard to support her family.

She has a business farming rice in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Marilyn is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies for her business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Marilyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilzers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Femie

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Femie works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Femie is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell for her general store business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Femie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 27 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Asylkan

texts.ru: Асылкан, 49 лет, замужем, есть 3 детей. У Асылкан среднее образование. Супруг и дети помогают по хозяйству. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, с 2002 года занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Асылкан в хозяйстве имеется: 2 коровы, 20 коз. Деятельность Асылкан приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Асылкан является одним из трех участников группы "Роза". Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства и хочет закончить строительство сарая.
texts.en: Asylkan is 49 years old, married,  and has three children. Asylkan has received secondary education. Her husband and children help her out on the farm. As a main source of income for her family, Asylkan has been raising livestock since 2002. Thanks to Asylkan's hard work, she now has two cows and 20 goats on her farm. Asylkan's business brings in about 10,000 KGS per month. In order to develop her business further, she has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KGS to buy livestock and increase her headcount. Asylkan is one of the three members of the Roza ["Rose"] borrowers' group. She plans to use the resulting revenue for a further expansion of her farm and would like to finish the construction of a shed.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase the headcount.

loans.name: Teddy

texts.en:
Teddy is a forty one year old, hard-working, married woman with five children living in Kamwenge Uganda. She runs a bar as her main source of income a business.

Teddy started with the intention of educating her children and improving on her standards of living. She also earns extra income from farming. She hopes to become a prominent business woman. Her main challenge is inadequate capital. 

Teddy needs a loan to buy more crates of beer, soda and cartons of water to boost her business.

loans.use: to buy more crates of beer, soda and cartons of water to boost her business.

loans.name: Desiree

texts.en:
Desiree is 42 years old and married with four children, who all attend school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Desiree has a restaurant business in the Philippines. Desiree requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional utensils and ingredients for her restaurant.

Desiree has been in this business for two years. In the future, Desiree would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional utensils and ingredients for her restaurant.

loans.name: Laura Felipa

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora Laura Felipa, ella pertenece al banco “Señor de los Temblores II” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. 
La socia Laura Felipa, la socia tiene 62 años de edad y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diaria con el negocio de venta de comida de forma ambulatoria, la socia vende su comida a todos sus clientes que le solictan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia. 
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, aceite, menestras entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Laura is a member of the Señor de los Temblores II communal bank in Cusco, Peru.

Laura Felipa is 62 years old and single.  She sells food on foot to all those who request her services and wants to continue working so she can continue helping her family.  She is asking for this loan to buy rice, cooking oil, soups, and other things.  She is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 31 years old, married and together with his spouse has been blessed with 2 children. 

Charles does carpentry and has been running the business for 6 years. He makes furniture which he sells to his customers and it has been profitable. 

He will use this loan to buy textiles for covering sofa sets and chairs. He will use the anticipated profits to open a show room to display his furniture. 

This is his fifth loan term from VisionFund Kenya and he repaid his previous loans successfully. In future he hopes to have a prosperous and stable business.

loans.use: to buy textiles for making sofa sets.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Nida works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling vegetables.  Nida is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to  purchase additional items to sell like soap, milk, can goods, coffee, etc for her general store business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Nida has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like soap, milk, canned goods, coffee, etc

loans.name: Seang's Group

texts.en: The members of Seang’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province, in Cambodia. Seang makes a living, primarily by cultivating rice. She does extra work as a tailor, and selling groceries at her home, to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these group members to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses. They will also save the time they would otherwise have spent, collecting fuel for boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Mebelyn

texts.es: MEBELYN: Es una mujer luchadora, originaria de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 31 años de edad, madre soltera de 2 hijos, el mayor de 6 años estudia su segundo grado de primaria y un pequeño de 3 años. Con el propósito de sacar adelante a sus hijos, conformo el grupo solidario Nueva Esperanza, para acceder a financiamiento, permitiéndole establecer su salón de belleza. Desde hace 15 años  vive en una casa de tambo de madera. Solicita su primer financiamiento en la modalidad de crédito individual, para cambiar la madera de su casa, comprar: madera, postes zinc, clavo y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es construir su vivienda de concreto y  mejorar la infraestructura de su salón de belleza.
texts.en:
Mebelyn is a hard-working woman originally from Puerto Cabezas. She is a 31 year old single mother of 2 children, the oldest is 6 years old and is in second grade, the youngest is 3 years old. With the goal of helping her children get ahead, she formed a solidarity group called Nueva Esperanza in order to access financing, and this enabled her to establish her own beauty salon.

She has lived in her wooden home for 15 years. She seeks her first financing as an individual borrower in order to change the wood in her home, and she will buy wood, zinc posts, nails, and cover the cost of labor. Her dream is to build a concrete home and improve the infrastructure of her beauty salon.

loans.use: to change the wood in her home.

loans.name: Jaime Aparicio

texts.es:
El socio Jaime, él pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de los Temblores II” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. 
El socio Jaime, el socio tiene 21 años de edad y es soltero, él socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a ejercer su carrera de diseñador grafico, él socio lleva buen tiempo con su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma poder salir adelante.
El socio solicito el crédito para la compra de una laptop.
El socio agradece a  KIVA por otorgarle el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Jaime is a member of the Señor de los Temblores II communal bank in Cusco, Peru.

Jaime is 21 years old and singe.  He is a graphic designer and has been doing this for some time.  Things are going well for his business thanks to the effort he puts in and he wants to continue working so that he can get ahead.

He is asking for this loan to buy a laptop.

He is grateful to Kiva for providing him this loan and he promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy a laptop

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
El socio  Mario pertenece al banco comunal SANTA ROSITA DE LIMA, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Mario sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de ropa, dvds entre otros, el socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien, el socio vende du mercadería  a sus clientes que le solicitan, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia..
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de Dvds .
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Mario is a member of the SANTA ROSITA DE LIMA communal bank, located in the Cusco province, department, and province.

Mario still sells clothing, DVDs and other things.  He has a good business and things are going well for him.  He sells to his customers and wants to continue working so he can support his family.  He will use the loan to buy DVDs.

He is grateful for the loan and promises to repay it on time.

loans.use: to buy DVDs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay educational advancement expenses

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy-and-sell coconuts business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy coconut to sell for her business.

Analiza has been in this business for 15 years. She earns additional income from food vending.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Analiza has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy coconuts.

loans.name: Koemleang's Group

texts.en:
Koemleang’s group lives in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. 

Koemleang works as a farmer to support her family. In her village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Ounny's Group

texts.en:
Ounny’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. 

Ounny makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a construction worker and tailor to support her family. In her village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water.  

Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Savang's Group

texts.en:
Savang’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. 

Savang makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor, construction worker and seller buying and selling groceries at home to support her family. 

In her village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Dominic

texts.en:
Dominic is full of energy, ambitious, and a go-getter. He is 22 years old and lives in the Litein area of Kenya. It is a popular tea-growing region. Dominic is a family man, blessed with a beautiful wife and one adorable child, who always bring a smile to his face. Dominic has farmed for five years. He has gathered so much experience that he is known as the best farmer in his village. Although he practices mixed farming, he really loves dairy farming and has even nicknamed one of his cows “Seroy” (the name of a person).

Dominic comes from a humble background and he had to work his way up. He is determined to succeed and puts twice the effort into his business. Although he earns a decent income, his biggest challenge is the lack of a dairy building, in which to milk his cows and rest his cows. Poor weather conditions affect the health of his cows, and he has to spend money buying medicine. The loan will help Dominic to comfortably milk his cows and save money that he used to spend in buying medicine. Dominic will be able to collect cow dung and urine, and will use it in his farm to increase productivity. Dominic is a very enterprising man who wants to provide a safe and secure future, and a solid education, for his family. This is a privilege he never had. Through increased profits from selling milk, Dominic will improve his life and realize his dreams.

loans.use: To build a dairy building.

loans.name: Ly's Group

texts.en:
Ly’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. 

Ly makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a construction worker and tailor to support her family. 

In her village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water.  Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 61 years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Lolita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Lolita has been in this business for 40 years and sells a variety of items such as sardines, soft-drinks, diapers, spices and other groceries. 

In the future Lolita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Sophon's Group

texts.en:
Sophon’s group lives in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia.  Sophon works as farmer to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each member of the group to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover exam and certification costs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay college fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover medical expenses (special examinations, purchase of medications).

loans.name: Santusa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE LIMA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Santusa sigue con su negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende su mercadería como cascas, chompas entre otros a todos sus clientes que le solicitan como amistades entre otros, la socia a la vez continua con su negocio de venta de comida, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pantalones entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
She is a member of the SANTA ROSITA DE LIMA communal bank, located in the Cusco province, department, and province.

Santusa continues to sell clothing such as cascas and sweaters to customers who request them.  She also sells food and supports her family this way.

She will use the loan to buy pants.

She is grateful for the loan and promises to repay it on time.

loans.use: to buy pants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a Ugandan man who is 37 years old and lives in Bundibugyo. He deals in motorcycle transportation, together with cocoa buying and selling. 

He wants a loan to buy cocoa for selling.

He has realized a lot of profits from the previous loan, which he invested very well.  He is very hard-working and wants to expand his business further.

loans.use: to buy cocoa for selling.

loans.name: Soknim's Group

texts.en: The members of Soknim’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province, in Cambodia. Soknim makes a living cultivating rice, and she does extra work as tailor to support her family. In the village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water.  Having a water filter at home will help these women and men to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time they would have spent collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Rith's Group

texts.en:
Rith’s group live in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. Rith works as farmer to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Samron's Group

texts.en:
Samron’s group lives in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. Samron works as farmer to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each member of the group to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.es:
Lorena es de la ciudad de Villarrica, es una persona que esta estudiando para ser alguien en la vida, y por medio de su profesión poder ayudar a las demás personas.
Está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas, y se esta esforzando por poder sobresalir y ser la mejor.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en las cuotas de su carrera y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en: Lorena is from Villarica City. She is studying to be someone in life, and through her chosen profession be able to hep others. She is studying a career in business administration, and she is preparing herself to be able to be successful and be the best. She seeks a loan to be able to invest in making the payments for her career studies and in this way be able to continue with her schooling.

loans.use: to pay for her career studies.

loans.name: Karen

texts.es:
Karen es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, está casada y comenta que se dedica al comercio y estudia a la noche.
Es una persona muy responsable y dedicada a sus estudios y a su familia , aspira a ser una buena profesional y seguir estudiando y servir a las personas, quiere ser una mecánica dental.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la carrera.
texts.en:
Karen is from the city of San Lorenzo. She is married and says she works retail and studies at night. She is a very responsible person and is dedicated to her studies and her family. She wants to become a good professional, finish school, and serve people. She wants to be a dental technician.

She is requesting this loan in order to be able to pay her school fees.

loans.use: to pay college fees.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge vive con su mamá, comenta que tiene un comercio de ramos generales, su padre había fallecido y Jorge se quedo como encargado y de esta manera le ayuda a su madre en el negocio.
Él viaja todos los días para llegar a la universidad y ademas estudia por la noche la carrera de comercio internacional, es una persona muy sacrificada y su anhelo es montar su propio  negocio.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Jorge lives with his mother. He says he runs a general store. He became the manager when his father passed away, so he helps his mother run the business. He travels every day to attend university and also studies International Trade at night. He is a very driven person and his goal is to start his own business.

He is requesting this loan in order to be able to pay his college fees, so that he can continue studying.

loans.use: to pay for college fees.

loans.name: Agusto

texts.es:
El Señor Agusto, es casado, tiene ya una familia formada, sus  hijos ya son mayores, todos profesionales que con mucho esfuerzo pudo sacar adelante, tiene un taller de reparación de Tv, Radio, Auto-radio, equipos de sonido, computadoras, etc. Que tiene en su casa.
Hace más de 25 años que se dedica a este trabajo y ya tiene muy buena clientela. Su esposa trabaja en un centro de salud, donde ayuda a las demás personas.
El préstamo lo pide para poder invertirlo en la compra de repuestos y materiales a ser utilizados en su taller de reparación.
texts.en:
Agusto is married and has already raised a family; his children are already adults, all of them professionals. Through great effort, he was able to help them get ahead in life. Agusto has a repair workshop for TVs, radios, car radios, sound equipment, computers, etc. It is located in his home. 

He has dedicated himself to this work for more than 25 years, and he has a very strong customer base. His wife works in a health center, where she helps others. 

He is requesting the loan so that he can invest in buying spare parts and materials to be used in his repair workshop.

loans.use: to buy various spare parts and materials for his workshop.

loans.name: Thon's Group

texts.en: Thon’s group lives in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. Thon works as farmer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men and women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: La Victoria Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado La Victoria está en su ciclo número 7 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Concepción, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aun se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra. Felipa es una de las que integra este grupo, ella hace comidas de todo tipo, y comenta que por medio de este humilde trabajo ella da a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener. Ella todos los días empieza su jornada desde muy tempranas horas para poder preparar sus comidas, y luego los sale a vender, es una mujer muy luchadora.
Felipa pide este préstamo para poder comprar los insumos para sus comidas, como ser verduras, condimentos, hortalizas, carne, y demás, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo, luchando por su familia.
texts.en:
The group called "La Victoria" is in its seventh loan cycle within the women's committee program. It is located in the city of Concepción, which is a little bit outside the central zone, and still growing. It is a zone that is difficult to access, and therefore the members of this group want to work hard to keep growing and give the area where they live a better environment, hoping to grow gradually. 

Felipa is one of the members of this group. She makes foods of all types, and she comments that through this humble work, she gives her family everything that she was unable to have. Every day, she starts her workday in the very early hours, preparing her foods and later going out to sell them. She is a very determined woman. 

Felipa is requesting this loan so that she can buy ingredients for her foods, such as greens, condiments, vegetables, and other items, so that she can continue with her business and work hard for her family.

loans.use: to buy greens, condiments, vegetables, meat and other ingredients.

loans.name: Deisy

texts.es:
Deisy es una joven que está estudiando, es muy independiente, tiene ganas de crecer y superarse como persona y profesionalmente.
Ella es estudiante de la carrera de Derecho, quiere ser una abogada que pueda ayudar a las demás personas en lo que estas necesiten.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, de manera a poder seguir luchando como lo viene haciendo por sus metas.
texts.en:
Deisy is a young student who is very independent and eager to grow and improve herself as a person as well as professionally. She is studying Law. She wants to become an attorney so that she can help others with whatever they may need.

She is requesting this loan in order to be able to pay her fees, so that she can continue fighting for her goals.

loans.use: to pay for college fees.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
El comité se llama Virgen de Fatima, todas ellas se caracterizan por el trabajo unido y por ayudarse las unas a las otras.
La Señora Shirley, es una de las integrantes de este grupo, es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, quien comenta que por medio de su trabajo ayuda a su familia y a sus seres queridos. Comenta que se ha hecho de muy buena clientela ya que siempre tiene muchos productos y es eso lo que gusta a sus clientes.
Shirley pide este préstamo para poder surtir su despensa, con todo tipo de productos para poder seguir con sus ventas, como ser verduras, carne, bebidas, panificados y demás. Ella está contenta por esta oportunidad que recibe y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called Virgen de Fatima. All of its members are known for working in a unified manner and helping each other. 

Shirley is one of this group's members. She is a very hard-working and enterprising person. She comments that through her work, she helps her family and her loved ones. She says that she has built up a strong customer base, since she always has a lot of products, and this is what her customers like. 

Shirley is requesting this loan so that she can stock her neighborhood store with every type of product, such as vegetables, meat, soft drinks, breads and other items, in order to continue with her sales. She is happy about this opportunity she is receiving, which will be of great help to her.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meats, soft drinks, breads and other items to stock her store.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.en:
Rustam comes from North Tajikistan. He is 19 years old. Rustam studies at the Khujand State University. He is a student of the second course. Rustam studies in absentia, and he also works in his time free from classes. He is a woodworker, and he makes his work with the highest quality. Rustam hopes he is a good specialist in the future. 

Rustam is asking for a loan of 500 USD to pay for his tuition. He awaits your mercy and thanks you in advance for your generosity.

loans.use: to pay for tuition

loans.name: Non's Group

texts.en: The members of Non’s group live in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. He works as farmer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these people safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a filter to provide safe drinking water to their families.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La Sra. Rosa tiene 47 años, es madre soltera, junto con su hija de 17 años  se dedica a la confección de ropas para niños, caballero y damas, en su propia casa todo sobre pedido , ya cuenta con su clientela formada que siempre le hace pedidos.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de telas de temporada, ya que este es su principal insumo y podrá seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en: Rosa, 47, is a single mother. Together with her 17 year old daughter, Rosa makes her living making clothing for children, men, and women on request, out of their own home. She already has a client base that always orders from her. She's asking for a loan in order to buy seasonal fabrics, because they're her main supplies and she will be able to continue her work as she has been doing.  She is grateful for the opportunity she's receiving which will help her very much.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fabrics for dressmaking

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as purlins, zinc and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Riza works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Riza is borrowing 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like sugar, coffee, eggs, noodles, etc., for her general store business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Riza has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like sugar, coffee, eggs, noodles, etc

loans.name: Virgie

texts.en: Virgie is a hardworking entrepreneur who buys and sells vegetables in the Philippines. She has requested a loan for PHP 18,000 from NWTF to buy more items to sell in her food stall. Virgie has been in this business for 15 years, and earns additional income by running a general store. She has successfully repaid a previous loan and is requesting a new loan to further build her businesses. She has sustained her business through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF, and dreams of saving enough money to continue to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motorbike that will assist him in delivering his perishable agricultural products

loans.name: Sreymom's Group

texts.en: Sreymom’s group lives in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. Sreymom works as a farmer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: La Terminal Group

texts.es:
La terminal se llama este grupo formado en la ciudad de San Pedro, una zona alejada de la capital del país, es una zona eminentemente rural, que aun se encuentra en crecimiento. Las integrantes de este grupo son mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras, que también se esfuerzan para que su zona vaya mejorando.
Lorena es una de las integrantes de este grupo, ella se dedica a la venta ambulante de todo tipo de productos, que sale a vender y que después por medio de sus ingresos ayuda a su familia. Ella se define a si misma como una mujer que quiere salir adelante y crecer para que a sus seres queridos no les falte nada.
Lorena pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas varias, calzados y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo, y de esa forma mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
This group calls itself "La terminal". They are in the city of San Pedro, a place far away from the capital of the country. Their area is rural, but it is growing.

The members of this group are hardworking and entrepreneurial woman who are also working hard so that their community improves.

Lorena is one of the members of this group. She sells all sorts of product on foot. She goes out to make her sales, and her earnings are a means to help her family. Lorena describes herself as a woman who wants to get ahead and to grow so that her family lacks for nothing. She requests this loan to purchase a variety of clothing items, shoes, and other things, so that she will be able to continue her work. By doing so she will improve the living conditions for herself and her family.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies to build a roof.

loans.name: Luzminda

texts.en: Luzminda is married and works hard to support her family by running a fishing business in the Philippines. She has requested a loan for PHP 11,000 from NWTF to buy additional materials for her business. Luzminda has been in her current line of work for five years. Her goal for the future is to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional supplies for her fishing business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, bread products and beverages.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
18 son las mujeres que integran este grupo, quienes están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder conocer la situación de vida de cada una de ellas y conforme a ello poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Eusebia, quien se dedica a la confección, comenta que tiene muy buena mano para la confección, y es por eso que ya tiene muy buena clientela. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, todo lo que hace es por sus seres queridos y por su familia.
Eusebia pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas, hilos, gomas y demás, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Ella agradece por la oportunidad que todas reciben y que les ayudará a poder mejorar sus vidas.
texts.en:
The eighteen women who are members of this communal blank are taking the poverty elimination questionnaire in order to acknowledge their life situations and to be able to improve their life conditions accordingly.  

One of the members is Sr. Eusebia, who is a dressmaker. She comments that she has a very good hand for dressmaking and that is why she already has a very good clientele She is a very hardworking and enterprising woman. Everything she does is for her dear ones and her family.

Eusebia is asking for this loan in order to purchase fabric, thread, adhesive and other items so that she can continue with the work she is doing. She is grateful for the opportunity that all are receiving and that helps them to be able to improve their lives.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, adhesive material and other items to use in dressmaking.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loans have helped her stabilize her business. She has been able to purchase additional groceries needed to increase her product inventory. The loan also has helped her provide for the educational expenses of her children and pay for their daily needs.

Merlinda is sure that she will improve her business when she receives a new loan of 18,000 PHP through CCT. This new loan will go toward additional stocks of groceries, toiletries and beverages. Her customers will be more likely to frequent her shop and buy more items if she has a greater volume of products displayed in her store. An increase in sales will result in larger profits and continue to help her business become ever more viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she will be able to meet the needs of her family.

Through CCT and lenders Merlinda hopes to become successful both in life and business. Locally, all CCT community partners and clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of fifteen to thirty community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of groceries, toiletries and beverages needed in her shop.

loans.name: Sabougnouma 4 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe  Sabougnouma 4  sont des hommes mariés  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 44 ans, 5 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Fonfona, un des villages de Koutiala, 3ème région administrative du Mali. Ils collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités de maraîchage. Ils sont à leur 2ème prêt.
La spéculation cultivée est l’échalote et tomate avec Drissa, arrêté 2ème  de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, il compte acheter des Semences, intrants et matériels pour exploiter sa partielle de 0,5 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à Koutiala, après la récolte, à une clientèle mixte. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 100 000FCFA en fin de période.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et faire face à ses dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The 10 members of the Sabougnouma 4 group are married men who on average are 44 years old with five children, all living in traditional families in Fonfona, one of the villages belonging to Koutiala, the third administrative region of Mali.

They have been working with the Soro Yiriwaso micro-finance institution in carrying out their crop gardening activities, and they are on their second loan. 

The selected crops are shallots and tomatoes featuring Drissa, the second person standing from right to left in the photo. He intends to use his loan to buy seeds, inputs and equipment to exploit his 0.5 hectare (1.24 acres) plot of land.

After harvest the crop will be sold at village level and in Koutiala, to a mixed clientele.

He expects average profits of 100,000 CFA francs by season's end, which will enable him to pay off his loan and cover his daily expenses.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizer and equipment

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a 55-year-old widow and a mother of seven children from Leyte, Philippines. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store in her place. She sells goods like rice, noodles, fruits, condiments and other food items. This has been the source of her income for more than 15 years now. 

She is asking for a loan to buy more stocks like rice, noodles, canned goods, soap and toiletries, condiments, fruits, and others. Through this loan, she will be able to improve her stocks, thus attracting more buyers in her store. In the future, Jocelyn hopes to make her store more profitable and stable.

loans.use: to buy more stocks like rice, noodles, canned goods, soap and toiletries, condiments, fruits, and others

loans.name: Gulira

texts.ru: Гулира, 46 лет, замужем, воспитывает 3 детей. У Гулиры средне-специальное образование, на протяжении 14 лет она работает медсестрой в Кардиологическом центре. Также занимается животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве есть 2 дойные коровы, 2 бычка, 1 лошадь и 13 овец. На участке мерою 3,15 Га собственной земли она выращивает  сахарную свеклу, клевер и малину. Также она ведет свой бизнес по реализации экологически чистого, домашнего и очень вкусного молока. Благодаря упорному труду Гулиры, ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулира обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья дойных коров. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в увеличение бизнеса.
texts.en: Gulira is 46 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  She has a specialized-secondary education, and she has been working as a nurse for 14 years in a cardiology center.  She is also involved in animal husbandry and agriculture.  She currently owns two dairy cows, two young bulls, one horse and 13 sheep.  In addition, she owns 3.15 hectares of land on which she grows sugar beets, clover and raspberries.  She also sells the delicious organic milk that she produces on her farm.  Thanks to her very hard work, she makes a monthly income of 15,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum for a loan of of 150,000 som (KGS).  She will use this loan to increase her headcount of dairy cows.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy dairy cows to produce and sell more organic milk.

loans.name: Channy's Group

texts.en:
Channy’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Channy makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of her family, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of her family, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel to boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water.  Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel to boiling water.
